task.summary: Added a contentcontroller to seperate the php code, made some simple changes in requestcontroller, also changed the index.php according to the contentcontroller
Added more to contentcontroller, added css & js file.
Fixed The include problem where I was getting incomplete php classes.
Working version, added a lot of css & Users can now register, also added user model & New function @DAO

[OK]- Functies naar util [OK]- Beschrijving weg doen & prijs op homepage // CSS aanpassen - css file cleaner maken? [OK]- DAO Object meesturen [OK]- sorteer functies allemaal [OK]- Datum Fixen [OK]- categorie in CSS fixen (Bij detail en bij overzicht) [OK]- Javascript ajax call Css gefixt [juiste tags terugsturen]
Added a before previous url method
Changed it so that you can get your password/username wrong and still end up at the page you were looking at before you tried to log in
Ge kunt nu bestellingen maken, dingen uit u full winkelmandje verwijderen, detail page beetje aangepast, menu bar beetje beter
